dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_NAME','SHIPPER') shipper_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD1','SHIPPER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD2','SHIPPER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD3','SHIPPER','3')) shipper_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_CITY','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_PRVNC','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ZIP','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_CNTRY','SHIPPER')) shipper_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_PHONE','SHIPPER','TEL:') shipper_phone, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.number_with_japan_tsc(cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT') || j.job_xid bill_lading, j.attribute3 export_references, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_NAME','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') consignee_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD1','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD2','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD3','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','3')) consignee_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_CITY','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_PRVNC','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ZIP','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_CNTRY','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE')) consignee_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_PHONE','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','TEL:') consignee_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_NAME','FORWARDING AGENT') agent_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD1','FORWARDING AGENT','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD2','FORWARDING AGENT','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD3','FORWARDING AGENT','3')) agent_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_CITY','FORWARDING AGENT',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_PRVNC','FORWARDING AGENT') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ZIP','FORWARDING AGENT') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_CNTRY','FORWARDING AGENT')) agent_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.POINT OF ORIGIN',s.source_location_gid,'PROVINCE') point_of_origin, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.COUNTRY OF ORIGIN',s.source_location_gid,'COUNTRY') country_of_origin, sref1.shipment_refnum_value place_of_receipt, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'DESTLOC',s.dest_location_gid,'COUNTRY') destination_location, (CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN TRIM((CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END) voyage_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_pr(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PORT OF LOAD',s.port_of_load_location_gid) load_port, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value loading_terminal, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PORT OF DISCHARGE',s.port_of_dis_location_gid) discharge_port, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF DELIVERY', (SELECT DISTINCT ship.dest_location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorjoin INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssuline ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = ssuline.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessujoin ON ssuline.s_ship_unit_gid = sessujoin.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssejoin ON sessujoin.s_equipment_gid = ssejoin.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON ssejoin.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'S' WHERE jorjoin.job_gid = j.job_gid)) place_of_delivery, (CASE WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DD' THEN 'Door-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DP' THEN 'Door-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PD' THEN 'Pier-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PP' THEN 'Pier-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RP' THEN 'Rail-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RD' THEN 'Rail-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RR' THEN 'Rail-to-Rail' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PR' THEN 'Pier-to-Rail' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DR' THEN 'Door-to-Rail' ELSE cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value END) move_type, REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)) descript_of_cargo, (CASE WHEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) = 0 THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.total_weight,'999,999,990.00')) ELSE TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990.00')) END) gross_weight, (CASE WHEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) = 0 THEN s.total_weight_uom_code ELSE (SELECT ssu.received_weight_uom FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) END) measurement, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (ssur.remark_text) FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ssu_y_n FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOADING_TERMINAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_MOVE_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF RECEIPT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l3 ON cv.source_location_gid = l3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l4 ON cv.dest_location_gid = l4.location_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL UNION SELECT NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_NAME','SHIPPER'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD1','SHIPPER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD2','SHIPPER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ADD3','SHIPPER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_CITY','SHIPPER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_PRVNC','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_ZIP','SHIPPER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_CNTRY','SHIPPER')), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.SHPPR_PHONE','SHIPPER','TEL:'), 'Data Missing in System') shipper_phone, NVL(cv.charter_voyage_xid, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.number_with_japan_tsc(cv.charter_voyage_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VIA_PORT_OF_DISCHARGE',cv.dest_location_gid,'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_TRANSHIP PORT') || NVL(j.job_xid, ' Data Missing in System') bill_lading, NVL(j.attribute3, 'Data Missing in System') export_references, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_NAME','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD1','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD2','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ADD3','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','3')), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_CITY','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_PRVNC','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_ZIP','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_CNTRY','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE')), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.UC_PHONE','ULTIMATE CONSIGNEE','TEL:'), 'Data Missing in System') consignee_phone, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_NAME','FORWARDING AGENT'), 'Data Missing in System') agent_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD1','FORWARDING AGENT','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD2','FORWARDING AGENT','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ADD3','FORWARDING AGENT','3')), 'Data Missing in System') agent_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_CITY','FORWARDING AGENT',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_PRVNC','FORWARDING AGENT') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_ZIP','FORWARDING AGENT') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.FA_CNTRY','FORWARDING AGENT')), 'Data Missing in System') agent_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.POINT OF ORIGIN',s.source_location_gid,'PROVINCE'), 'Data Missing in System') point_of_origin, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.COUNTRY OF ORIGIN',s.source_location_gid,'COUNTRY'), 'Data Missing in System') country_of_origin, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') place_of_receipt, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.origin_entity(s.shipment_gid,'DESTLOC',s.dest_location_gid,'COUNTRY'), 'Data Missing in System') destination_location, NVL((CASE WHEN sref2.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN TRIM((CASE WHEN cv.voyage_name IS NULL THEN v.vessel_name ELSE cv.voyage_name END) || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) ELSE sref2.shipment_refnum_value END), 'Data Missing in System') voyage_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place_pr(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PORT OF LOAD',s.port_of_load_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') load_port, NVL(cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') loading_terminal, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PORT OF DISCHARGE',s.port_of_dis_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') discharge_port, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.port_place(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF DELIVERY', (SELECT DISTINCT ship.dest_location_gid FROM job_order_release_join jorjoin INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssuline ON jorjoin.order_release_gid = ssuline.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessujoin ON ssuline.s_ship_unit_gid = sessujoin.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssejoin ON sessujoin.s_equipment_gid = ssejoin.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment ship ON ssejoin.shipment_gid = ship.shipment_gid AND ship.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ship.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND ship.is_primary = 'Y' AND ship.perspective = 'S' WHERE jorjoin.job_gid = j.job_gid)), 'Data Missing in System') place_of_delivery, NVL((CASE WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DD' THEN 'Door-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DP' THEN 'Door-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PD' THEN 'Pier-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PP' THEN 'Pier-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RP' THEN 'Rail-to-Pier' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RD' THEN 'Rail-to-Door' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'RR' THEN 'Rail-to-Rail' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'PR' THEN 'Pier-to-Rail' WHEN cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value = 'DR' THEN 'Door-to-Rail' ELSE cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_value END), 'Data Missing in System') move_type, NVL(REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)), 'Data Missing in System') descript_of_cargo, (CASE WHEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) = 0 THEN NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(s.total_weight,'999,999,990.00')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990.00')), 'Data Missing in System') END) gross_weight, (CASE WHEN NVL((SELECT SUM(ssu.received_weight) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1),0) = 0 THEN NVL(s.total_weight_uom_code, 'Data Missing in System') ELSE NVL((SELECT ssu.received_weight_uom FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1), 'Data Missing in System') END) measurement, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (ssur.remark_text) FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) ssu_y_n FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sr ON s.shipment_gid = sr.shipment_gid AND sr.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON 'SCOULAR/NVO.' || sr.shipment_refnum_value = cv.charter_voyage_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN vessel v ON cv.vessel_gid = v.vessel_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOADING_TERMINAL' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr3 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr3.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr3.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_MOVE_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.PLACE OF RECEIPT' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.VESSEL_VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL DESCRIPTION OF CARGO' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l3 ON cv.source_location_gid = l3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l4 ON cv.dest_location_gid = l4.location_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL

SELECT a.s_ship_unit_gid, a.container_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(a.tag_1 || ' ' || a.seal_2 || ' ' || a.seal_3),'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(a.tag_1 || ' ' || a.seal_2 || ' ' || a.seal_3) END) seal_num, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(a.short_desc,'Data Missing in System') ELSE a.short_desc END) short_desc FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ssu.tag_3 container_num, ssu.tag_1, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 2') seal_2, (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTAINER SEAL NUMBER 3') seal_3, (SELECT ssur.remark_text FROM s_ship_unit_remark ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.DESCRIPTION OF CARGO OVERRIDE') short_desc FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a ORDER BY a.s_ship_unit_gid ASC

SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, (CASE WHEN :SUM_PIECES = 'YES' THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN (SELECT LISTAGG( TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.counter), '999,999,990') || ' ' || (CASE WHEN SUM(a.counter) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) END)),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.p_type) pieces FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) counter, TRIM(ssur2.refnum_value) p_type FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a GROUP BY a.p_type) ELSE NVL( (SELECT LISTAGG( TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.counter), '999,999,990') || ' ' || (CASE WHEN SUM(a.counter) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = a.p_type) END)),', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.p_type) pieces FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) counter, TRIM(ssur2.refnum_value) p_type FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a GROUP BY a.p_type), 'Data Missing in System') END) ELSE (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN TRIM(ssur1.refnum_value || ' ' || (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = ssur2.refnum_value) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = ssur2.refnum_value) END) ) ELSE NVL(TRIM(ssur1.refnum_value || ' ' || (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(regexp_replace(ssur1.refnum_value,'^.*?(\d+)\.doc$','\1')) > 1 THEN (SELECT pt.plural_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = ssur2.refnum_value) ELSE (SELECT pt.singular_text FROM glogowner.xxscou_piece_type pt WHERE pt.code = ssur2.refnum_value) END) ), 'Data Missing in System') END) END) piece_num FROM job_order_release_join jorj INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd ON s.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE COUNT' LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PIECE TYPE' WHERE jorj.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND (:SUM_PIECES = 'YES' AND ROWNUM = 1 OR :SUM_PIECES = 'NO') ORDER BY ssu.s_ship_unit_gid ASC

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_NP_LINE1') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'NOTIFY PARTY') IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_NAME','NOTIFY PARTY'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_name(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_NAME','NOTIFY PARTY') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_ADD1','NOTIFY PARTY','1') IS NULL THEN 'Data Missing in System' ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_ADD1','NOTIFY PARTY','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_ADD2','NOTIFY PARTY','2')) END) ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_ADD1','NOTIFY PARTY','1') || CHR(13) || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.NP_ADD2','NOTIFY PARTY','2')) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY')), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY')) END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY','PH'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY','PH') END) || CHR(13) || (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY','FAX'), 'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fax_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','NOTIFY PARTY','FAX') END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_contact_desc(s.shipment_gid,'NOTIFY PARTY'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END) ELSE REPLACE(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.remark_value(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVO.HBL_NP_LINE1'),CHR(13) || CHR(13),CHR(13)) END) notify_name FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.transport_mode_gid = 'VESSEL-CO' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL

SELECT (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_name ELSE '' END) facility_name, (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_address ELSE '' END) facility_address, (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_city_state_zip ELSE '' END) facility_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_fullname ELSE '' END) facility_fullname, (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_phone ELSE '' END) facility_phone, (CASE WHEN a.print_yes_no > 1 THEN a.facility_email ELSE '' END) facility_email FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(loc.location_name,'Data Missing in System') ELSE loc.location_name END) facility_name, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc.location_gid),'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc.location_gid) END) facility_address, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc.location_gid),'Data Missing in System') ELSE glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc.location_gid) END) facility_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT TRIM(first_name || ' ' || last_name) FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT TRIM(first_name || ' ' || last_name) FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid) END) facility_fullname, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT phone1 FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT phone1 FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid) END) facility_phone, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'DRAFT' THEN NVL((SELECT email_address FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid),'Data Missing in System') ELSE (SELECT email_address FROM contact WHERE contact_gid = loc.location_gid) END) facility_email, (SELECT COUNT(qcos.quote_gid) FROM quote_cost_option_shipment qcos WHERE perspective = 'B' AND quote_gid IN (SELECT quote_gid FROM order_release WHERE order_release_gid IN (SELECT order_release_gid FROM job_order_release_join WHERE job_gid = :JOB_ID))) print_yes_no FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON jorj.order_release_gid = ssul.order_release_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssul.s_ship_unit_gid = sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON sessuj.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN shipment s ON ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.is_primary = 'N' AND s.shipment_type_gid != 'SECONDARY CHARGE' AND NOT s.source_location_gid IS NULL AND ROWNUM = 1 INNER JOIN location loc ON s.source_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND NOT s.shipment_gid IS NULL) a
